channel.title: I'm open minded, are you?
channel.description:
Are you as open minded as I am when it come's to music?
I like a little of it all.
My personal favorite is metal, Bands such as,- Overkill,Black Sabbath, Death,Helloween.atheist,Control Denied [same band as Death, really], Vader, Slayer, OLD Metallica. I like OLD [NOT MAINSTREEM NEW MESS] rap. I like Jazz I like Blues.. I like OLD country [just like rap not this newer junk]. Punk Grunge Classic Rock //////\\\\\ This bring's me too ask, how open minded are you to the music you listen too, what type's do you like?

item.title: I'm open minded, are you?

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

everything except like deathmetal crap and rap.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm open minded, are you?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

I dont like country or rap
I am not around blues or jazz so no opinion

I like all metal practically
I also like rock

but not emo, and some punk maybe

Read full topic

item.title: I'm open minded, are you?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I never used to be open minded about music. I used to always listen to rap because my friends did and i felt pressured to know all the latest rap songs and shit. Now i couldn’t care less, i still listen to rap but i also have my fare share of rock music. None of the heavy screamo (not to be confused with heavy metal*) stuff though, it’s a pathetic excuse for music.

*I don’t like heavy metal either but I understand the talent it takes to perform it, I was just saying how shit screamo is.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm open minded, are you?
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Yes, I don’t care for the new ‘Gangsta’ sence crap… Just makes me mad.

item.title: I'm open minded, are you?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I’m almost as open minded, the only difference is that you like old rap. I only listen to technical instrumental music (i.e, no computerized-beats of any kind).
